caption.p: Effects of heavy rain on discharge and SIP in the Manitowoc River and Lake Michigan. ( a) Map of sampling sites. ( b) Plume of turbid, high DOM river water entering the lake following heavy rain events in late June 2011. ( c) Precipitation, river discharge, and SIP averaged over the top 1 m depth at sites along the river and lake. SIP above (e+) and below (e−) lake surface and at Red Arrow Beach (RAB, a popular swimming site), 8 th St. (at bridge), USGS (gage station, discharge data source), BR (Branch River), UR (Union Road bridge).
